/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. Dominating the center of the frame is a large, curved overpass, constructed from gray concrete and adorned with a yellow stripe running along its top. The overpass arches over the street, creating a tunnel-like effect that draws the viewer's eye into the image.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their gray facades blending harmoniously with the overpass. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the side of the street, hinting at the life and activity in this part of the city.

The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. Despite the absence of sunshine, the image is far from gloomy. Instead, it exudes a calm and serene atmosphere, as if inviting the viewer to take a leisurely stroll down the street and explore what lies beyond the overpass. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, captured in a moment of quiet beauty.
